channel.title: All Registered Polls for the European Parliament
channel.description: All Registered Polls for the European Parliament

item.title: Opinion Poll by Mediana for POP TV, 1–23 June 2019 – Voting Intentions
item.description:
• Slovenska demokratska stranka (EPP): 21.2–27.5%
  • Lista Marjana Šarca (ALDE): 23.8–30.3%
  • Socialni demokrati (S&D): 10.1–14.9%
  • Stranka modernega centra (ALDE): 1.2–3.2%
  • Levica (GUE/NGL): 7.5–11.8%
  • Nova Slovenija–Krščanski demokrati (EPP): 7.5–11.8%
  • Stranka Alenke Bratušek (ALDE): 2.1–4.8%
  • Demokratična stranka upokojencev Slovenije (ALDE): 2.7–5.6%
  • Slovenska nacionalna stranka (NI): 3.4–6.6%
  • Slovenska ljudska stranka (EPP): 2.1–4.8%

item.title: Opinion Poll by Ninamedia for Dnevnik and Večer, 11–13 June 2019 – Voting Intentions
item.description:
• Slovenska demokratska stranka (EPP): 19.4–25.5%
  • Lista Marjana Šarca (ALDE): 26.3–33.1%
  • Socialni demokrati (S&D): 9.9–14.8%
  • Stranka modernega centra (ALDE): 0.3–1.7%
  • Levica (GUE/NGL): 5.8–9.8%
  • Nova Slovenija–Krščanski demokrati (EPP): 6.2–10.3%
  • Stranka Alenke Bratušek (ALDE): 0.9–2.8%
  • Demokratična stranka upokojencev Slovenije (ALDE): 2.9–5.9%
  • Slovenska nacionalna stranka (NI): 1.3–3.5%
  • Slovenska ljudska stranka (EPP): 1.2–3.3%
